text: your Valentine is gonna go nuts for
these boozy pecan balls and the best
part is there is no cooking involved no
baking you don't even have to melt any
chocolate we start with one and a half
cups of ground roasted pecans and you
could switch up the nut here if you like
something else then 1/2 a cup of
superfine sugar it's important to use
the superfine sugar here just so that
the granules of sugar are smaller when
you bite into that pecan ball so mix
these up together get rid of any lumps
in the sugar then three tablespoons of a
light corn syrup this is going to help
with the texture 1/8 of a teaspoon of
ground cloves this will add something
really great if you want to use
something like cinnamon you can or
ginger those would be good as well I
really like cloves with pecans so I'm
using that here then last but not least
1 tablespoon of cognac and you can leave
this out if you want I would just add a
little bit of water or like an orange
juice or something like that just for
the liquid keep stirring until this
really starts to hold together it'll
look pretty sandy at first but the more
you work it the more it will start to
clump as you can see now it's really
starting to hold together that's what we
want ok so now I have a 1 inch ice-cream
scoop but you could use a teaspoon or
just eyeball it with your hands but I
find this scoop makes a very uniform
even a convo so that's perfect just kind
of pack it into the scoop and then right
onto the tray okay so once you have
enough scooped here it's time for
rolling just get these little scoops
nice and rounded into a ball and then I
have another cup of the ground toasted
pecans so this goes right into the
pecans and they just adhere right to the
outside that one's done if it's
crumbling a little bit just press it
together and then roll it into a ball
right in the pecans and you can keep
these in the refrigerator or at room
temperature if you want to make them a
head
I would store them in the refrigerator
for about a week or so they'll only get
better as that cognac kind of live-ins
up inside each one okay I'm gonna keep
rolling and then we'll box them up I
have quite a few really pretty and very
delicious boozy pecan balls here I'm
just going to place them in these little
cupcake liners these are mini cupcake
liners right inside a pretty box it's
nice to make lots of these boxes and
give them as gifts or you can make one
big box or you could just eat them all
yourself but don't forget to share these
are really gray and such a nice
Valentine's Day treat
